name: 李鎮宇
objective:
As 3rd year course in marketing research, this course is designed to

1.	Introduce the role, scope, process and fundamental concepts of marketing and market research
2.	Provide an understanding of research methodology and its implementation 

3.	Support the student to do a real marketing research project (using SAS Viya)

The course emphasizes an applied approach with practical applications of marketing research in management. The class will introduce the basic concepts, and support the students on an independent research project– like actual projects in the industry. The project is intended to be enjoyable but also a preparation for project-based work encountered the industry. It will also be a useful project experience for future job applications.

This course contains two parts. The first part covers fundamental knowledge of marketing research. The second part covers the application of marketing research, through the visual tools of SAS Viya.

9	Exam Week

12	Correlation and Regression

17	Course Revision
